content: New solar array plan in North District farmland. Targeting 50 MW. Land lease negotiations in progress.
metadata: Projected start: Q4 2025, developer: SunBeam LLC

content: Pilot geothermal unit under feasibility study near East District. Expected 5 MW if viable.
metadata: Survey drilling: 2025-07, potential partner: GeoTherm Solutions

content: Hydro expansion at RBC-12 to add fish-friendly turbines. Could boost by 20 MW.
metadata: Awaiting environmental impact statement, possible Q1 2026 start

content: Battery co-located with GWF-19 wind farm. Additional 25 MWh to handle overnight lull.
metadata: Operator synergy with GRID-205, contract sign date: 2025-06

content: Small rooftop solar incentive for low-income residential homes. Rebate up to $2,000 per install.
metadata: Region: West District, possible tie-in with net meter (BILL-304)
